data.message: so wassup Facebook, im STILL waiting to know why you blocked me yesterday for a picture that didnt violate any of your lil guidelines. i wrote you yesterday while i was blocked, hoping someone would read it and realize that im being punished for something really stupid and unblock me yesterday, but they didnt, in fact, you still havent found the courtesy to get back to me by today. so now im going to keep writing you all day because im EXTREMELY PISSED OFF that i was blocked when i didnt do anything wrong, during a times that im sorta depressed and would really enjoy using facebook to connect with other people who can make me happy.
